newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: Spot Saudi riyal, interbank rates steady.
newsitem.headline: Spot Saudi riyal, interbank rates steady.

text.p: The spot Saudi riyal was steady against the dollar and riyal interbank rates were unchanged in moderate trade this week.
Dealers in the kingdom said trade focused on the swaps with sufficient liquidity in the market.
Short-dated funds were put at 5-7/16, 5/16 percent.
One-month deposits were at 5-7/16, 5/16 percent, three months at 5-9/16, 7/16 percent, six months at 5-11/16, 9/16 percent and one-year maturities at 5-15/16, 13/16 percent.
The spot riyal was unchanged at 3.7504/06 to the dollar.
